title: Discover the Best Souvenirs at Narita Airport
description: Your final opportunity before departure! From luxurious sweets to iconic Japanese specialties, we'll guide you through the perfect gifts to pick up at Narita Airport that everyone will love.
content:
# Discover the Best Souvenirs at Narita Airport

Narita Airport is your last-minute shopping haven before you leave Japan. The airport is packed with souvenir shops offering a wide array of exquisite products from across Japan, including exclusive limited-edition items. Make the most of your time before boarding to find the perfect keepsakes. Take home a taste and quality of Japan before your flight back.

## Luxury Butter Sandwich Specialty Shop

<Place id="ChIJdchIyRHzImARkebb5BUISBU" />

You'll find the PRESS BUTTER SAND store in Narita Airport Terminal 2. Their butter sandwiches, featuring rich butter cream sandwiched between crispy cookies, are incredibly popular souvenirs. They also offer airport-exclusive packaging and seasonal products, making them perfect for a special gift. With a relatively long shelf life, they are an excellent choice for taking abroad.

## A Parisian Luxury Patisserie

<Place id="ChIJo_CEcADzImARELuOGJSr_t4" />

Located within Narita Airport is the Pierre Hermé Paris boutique. Here you'll find artistic sweets crafted by the world-renowned pastry chef. Sophisticated French confections like macarons and chocolates are perfect for that special someone. With airport-exclusive items also available, it's a valuable chance to purchase these before departing Japan.

## Japanese Specialty Product Select Shop

<Place id="ChIJG6AYvQzzImARiwv6KsLGhuA" />

This select shop inside Narita Airport gathers exquisite products from all over Japan. You'll find a rich assortment of high-quality, uniquely Japanese items, including wagashi (traditional Japanese sweets), seasonings, and handicrafts. There are also many regional specialties, allowing you to discover souvenirs from areas you might not have visited during your trip. The appealing selection makes it easy to browse, even with limited time before your flight.

## Find Special Souvenirs at Narita Airport

Luxury butter sandwiches, a Parisian luxury patisserie, a Japanese specialty product select shop – Narita Airport offers a delightful array of souvenirs you can purchase in your final moments before heading home. Why not spend a little time before your flight finding a truly special gift for your loved ones?
